Horse Women Central.1: No users below 18, this is an adult server and no minors will be admited, if I come to knowledge of any member being a minor it will be grounds to kick them/ ban them inmediately. You'll be welcome to come back once you are of age.
Horse Women Central.2: No political, or religious disccusion, because the best way to get people angry is to discuss either of those subjects.
Horse Women Central.3: No harassing each other! Do not beg, or demand free art from any artist, this includes requests, as well as sexual harassment and demands for nudes or cybering. No means no.
Horse Women Central.4: No posting of certain kinks/fetiches such as, but not limited to gore, vore, scat, diaper, or others of the sort, I'll edit this rule as I remember more of my personal no-nos.
Horse Women Central.5: No loli or foalcon. We go by appearance for this rule and not canonical age. If it's a fictional character and can pass for 18, then it's allowed. The same goes in reverse though. If a character is older than 18, but looks like a loli, it's not kosher here.
Horse Women Central.6: No uploading of patreon exclusive pics of any kind, unless the artist himself decides to upload them.
Horse Women Central.7: No picture spam (Limited to 5 pictures every 10 mins)
Horse Women Central.8: No uploading of any potentially malicious link, videos, or images that could crash discord, contain viruses, or be dangerous in any other way.
Horse Women Central.9: Posting explicit images of real-life persons conducting lewd acts (i.e. pornography) is forbidden in the main art-sharing channels. This server is primarily for the sharing and distribution of drawn art (traditional, digital, 3D-modeling, etc.) both safe and explicit. For clarification, the 'art-sharing-nsfw' channel is the channel that usually has the month in the title. As an example, it is currently 'always-anal-april-nsfw' as of the writing of this rule.
Horse Women Central.34: There is porn of it, no exception. If not, you must make it.
Horse Women Central.63: For every given male character, there is a female version of that character; conversely for every given female character, there is a male version of that character.
Horse Women Central.r1: Respect your fellow players. If there's an active roleplay going on in the channel, don't just invite yourself! Ask out-of-character first if you can join in.
Horse Women Central.r2: No gore play please. If that's your thing, we don't kink shame you here, but please keep it in DM's
Horse Women Central.r3: Don't ping someone unless you absolutely have to! Nobody likes getting pinged for no reason.
Horse Women Central.r4: Keep out-of-character chatting outside the channel, please!
Horse Women Central.r5: Violating these rules is considered grounds for revocation of channel access. READ THE RULES, PLEASE! IGNORANCE IS NO EXCUSE!
Horse Women Central.r6: If you are rp-ing in a room and want to change to a different one, say it on the other channel so that other people can join you if they wish to!
Horse Women Central.r7: Remember this is ero-rp, anyone with the “under-18” role will not have acess to the roleplay area, if someone does, please report me and I’ll remove the role from the user, this is to not get our server closed, lol.
Horse Women Central.r8: Use of magic and fantasy  technology is restricted to benign or sexual purposes. This is an ero-rp, not a test of power level.
Horse Women Central.r10: If a player has not interacted in 24hrs it is assumed they left
Horse Women Central.r11:
Do not disrespect your fellow players by abandoning the roleplay through unannounced AFK's.

 Doing so will result in moderator intervention to remove your character from the situation and an evaluation of the frequency in which you have engaged in this disrespectful behavior.
Horse Women Central.r12:
The Abandoned Factory is a rule free zone intended for doing things that would be outside the law, with three key exceptions. No death, no gore, and no forcing people to go there.

 If you voluntarily travel to this location, you accept that something bad might happen
